attributes.action: Give Trading Standards Departments the Powers to Tackle Fake Door to Door Charity Collections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently a grey area of British Law which allows unscrupulous "companies" to prey on the goodwill of the populace through unlicensed and uncontrolled door to door "charity" collections this is adversely affecting the donations to legitimate charities; there needs to be a power to act to shut these fraudsters down and a clearly delineated body such as local Trading Standards departments to enforce it
